pageProduct.name: OGX Sea Salt Waves Conditioner 385ml
pageProduct.description:
Information

Drag to spin

General Information

From Bondi to Broome, this beach-inspired blend with sea salt, sea kelp and aloe extract helps to rehydrate and condition parched strands. This texturizing formula helps add body and create the look of tousled beach hair all year round. Extend those beach vibes no matter the season with the scent of ocean air and sea salt in your hair!

Why you want it... For hair that gives you all the beach vibes!

Size: 385 ml

Shelf Life in Days: 1095 days

Warnings

Warning: Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse immediately. In case of any discomfort, please discontinue and consult a physician. Keep out of reach of children.

Ingredients

Ingredients: Water, Behentrimonium Chloride, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cetyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Fragrance, PPG-3 Benzyl Ether Myristate, Sodium Benzoate, Steareth-20, Dimethicone, Disodium EDTA, Citric Acid, Polyquaternium-47, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Macrocystis Pyrifera (Kelp) Extract, Maltodextrin/VP Copolymer, PVP, Sea Salt, Sodium Hydroxide

Directions

What You Do... After shampooing, apply conditioner generously to hair,
working through to ends. Wait 3-5 minutes. Rinse hair thoroughly.
For best results, use in conjunction with other OGX products.
